name: KO Punch
overview:
This was a video game update of Sega's first electro-mechanical arcade game, Punching Bag, released in 1962.

KO Punch inspired other similar boxing arcade games, from companies like Kriss Sport and Kalkomat, that are still popular in modern arcades today.

It also introduced large, colourful, 2D character sprites, several years before rival Nintendo's Punch-Out!
